name: ClawdVegas Craps
description: Real-money craps game for AI agents using $CLAWDVEGAS tokens on Base chain

stories.title: Initialize TypeScript project
stories.description: Create package.json with Node.js 20+, TypeScript 5+, ESLint, Prettier. Add scripts for dev, build, test, lint. Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode.

stories.title: Set up development environment
stories.description: Add nodemon or tsx for hot reload during development. Create src/index.ts entry point that logs 'ClawdVegas Craps server starting...'
acceptance: npm run dev starts server with hot reload

stories.title: Implement dice rolling
stories.description: Create src/engine/dice.ts with rollDice() function that returns [die1, die2] tuple. Use crypto.randomInt for secure randomness. Export helper getTotal(dice) and isHardway(dice) functions.
acceptance: rollDice returns array of two numbers 1-6
isHardway returns true only for doubles

stories.title: Implement game state machine
stories.description: Create src/engine/state.ts with GameState interface and transition functions. States: waiting_for_shooter, come_out_betting, come_out_roll, point_set_betting, point_roll. Include point tracking and shooter management.
acceptance: GameState interface defined with all required fields
Transitions validate current state before changing
Unit tests for all state transitions

stories.title: Implement Pass Line bet
stories.description: Create src/engine/bets.ts with Bet interface and PassLineBet class. Implement canPlace(state), resolve(roll) methods. Pass wins on 7/11 come-out, loses on 2/3/12. After point: wins on point, loses on 7.
acceptance: PassLineBet can only be placed during come_out_betting
Resolves to 'won' on 7 or 11 during come-out
Resolves to 'lost' on 2, 3, or 12 during come-out

stories.title: Implement Don't Pass bet
stories.description: Add DontPassBet class to bets.ts. Opposite of Pass Line but 12 pushes (bar-12). Wins on 2/3 come-out, loses on 7/11. After point: wins on 7, loses on point.
acceptance: DontPassBet can only be placed during come_out_betting
Resolves to 'won' on 2 or 3 during come-out
Resolves to 'lost' on 7 or 11 during come-out
Unit tests cover all scenarios including bar-12

stories.title: Implement Come bet
stories.description: Add ComeBet class. Works like Pass but placed after point established. Has its own 'come point' that travels. First roll after placement: 7/11 wins, 2/3/12 loses, other numbers become come-point.
acceptance: ComeBet can only be placed during point_set_betting
First roll: wins on 7/11, loses on 2/3/12
After come-point: wins when come-point rolls, loses on 7
Come-point tracked separately from table point

stories.title: Implement Place bets
stories.description: Add PlaceBet class for numbers 4,5,6,8,9,10. Can be placed after point established. Wins when number rolls before 7. Different payouts per number: 4/10 pays 9:5, 5/9 pays 7:5, 6/8 pays 7:6.
acceptance: Can only be placed during point_set_betting
Correct payout ratios for each number
Unit tests for each number and payout

stories.title: Implement C&E bets
stories.description: Add CrapsElevenBet class. This is actually two half-bets: Any Craps (2,3,12) and Eleven. Wins 7:1 on respective outcomes, loses on all others. One-roll bet that resolves immediately.
acceptance: C&E can be placed any time bets are open
Loses entire bet on any other roll
Always resolves on next roll (one-roll bet)

stories.title: Implement payout calculations
stories.description: Create src/engine/payouts.ts with calculatePayout(bet, outcome) function. Use bigint for all amounts. Handle fractional payouts correctly (round down). Export PAYOUT_RATIOS constant.

stories.title: Implement shooter rotation
stories.description: Add shooter management to state.ts. Shooter changes on seven-out. Track shooter queue for multiple players. Handle case where shooter leaves mid-game.
acceptance: Shooter rotates to next player on seven-out
Current shooter can pass dice voluntarily
If shooter leaves, next in queue takes over
If no players, state returns to waiting_for_shooter

stories.title: Create table orchestrator
stories.description: Create src/engine/table.ts that ties everything together. CrapsTable class manages state, bets, players. Methods: join(), leave(), placeBet(), roll(). Emits events for all actions.
acceptance: join() adds player and handles shooter queue
leave() removes player and handles shooter rotation
roll() executes dice roll and resolves all bets
Events emitted: player_joined, bet_placed, dice_rolled, bet_resolved
Integration test: full game cycle works

stories.title: Create CrapsTable contract
stories.description: Create contracts/CrapsTable.sol with chip ledger. Players deposit $CLAWDVEGAS to get chips. Track balances per player. Only game server can settle bets.
acceptance: Uses OpenZeppelin for Ownable and ReentrancyGuard
Game server address stored as trusted operator

stories.title: Implement buy-in and cash-out
stories.description: Add buyIn(uint256 amount) that transfers tokens and credits chips. Add cashOut() that burns chips and returns tokens. Require token approval first.
acceptance: buyIn transfers tokens from player to contract
cashOut burns all chips and returns tokens
Cannot cash out with active bets (optional: add later)

stories.title: Implement bet settlement
stories.description: Add lockBet(player, amount, betId) called when bet placed. Add settleBet(betId, player, payout) called on resolution. Only operator can call these. Track locked vs available chips.
acceptance: lockBet reduces available balance, increases locked
If payout > 0, add winnings from house bankroll
If payout == 0, transfer locked amount to house

stories.title: Add bankroll management
stories.description: Track house bankroll separately. Add depositHouseBankroll() for owner. Add withdrawHouseProfit(amount) for owner. Add getHouseBankroll() view.
acceptance: House bankroll tracked separately from player chips

stories.title: Write Foundry tests
stories.description: Create test/CrapsTable.t.sol with comprehensive tests. Test all functions, access control, edge cases. Use fork testing against Base mainnet for token interactions.
acceptance: Tests cover happy path for all functions
Tests cover edge cases (insufficient balance, etc)

stories.title: Deploy to Base Sepolia
stories.description: Create deployment script scripts/deploy.ts. Deploy contract to Base Sepolia testnet. Verify on BaseScan. Document deployed address.
acceptance: Operator set to game server wallet

stories.title: Implement wallet authentication
stories.description: Create src/api/auth.ts with verifySignature(message, signature, address) using viem. Generate session tokens (JWT) after verification. Middleware to protect routes.
acceptance: Session token generated on successful auth

stories.title: Create table join endpoint
stories.description: Create POST /api/table/join that authenticates player, adds to table, returns session and current state. Validate wallet has $CLAWDVEGAS balance.
acceptance: Requires valid signature in request body
Checks on-chain balance before allowing join
Returns session_id and full table state

stories.title: Create bet placement endpoint
stories.description: Create POST /api/bet/place that validates bet type, amount, game state. Call contract to lock chips. Add bet to table. Return bet confirmation.
acceptance: Validates bet allowed in current game phase

stories.title: Create roll endpoint
stories.description: Create POST /api/shooter/roll for current shooter to roll dice. Validate caller is shooter. Execute roll, resolve bets, update state. Return roll result and settlements.
acceptance: Requires valid session of current shooter
Returns 403 if caller is not shooter
Calls contract settleBet for each resolution
Returns dice values, total, outcome, settlements
Broadcasts dice_rolled and bet_resolved via WebSocket

stories.title: Create table state endpoint
stories.description: Create GET /api/table/state returning current game state. Include phase, point, shooter, all players, all bets, last roll, house bankroll.
acceptance: Includes all active bets with amounts

stories.title: Implement WebSocket server
stories.description: Create src/api/ws.ts with WebSocket server on /ws/table. Broadcast all game events to connected clients. Support spectator connections (no auth required).
acceptance: WebSocket server starts with HTTP server
All CrapsTable events broadcast to clients
Events include: player_joined, bet_placed, dice_rolled, bet_resolved, ace_says

stories.title: Add rate limiting
stories.description: Add rate limiting middleware using express-rate-limit. Limit to 10 requests/second per IP and per wallet. Return 429 on limit exceeded.
acceptance: Rate limit enforced per IP address
Rate limit enforced per wallet (for authenticated routes)
Returns 429 with retry-after header when exceeded

stories.title: Connect game server to contract
stories.description: Create src/contract/client.ts with viem client for Base. Implement functions to call contract methods. Handle transaction confirmation and errors.
acceptance: Viem client configured for Base mainnet
Functions for: lockBet, settleBet, getChipBalance, getHouseBankroll

stories.title: Implement bankroll monitoring
stories.description: Add monitoring that checks house bankroll periodically. Adjust max bet dynamically based on bankroll. Log warnings when thresholds crossed.
acceptance: If bankroll < 1B, max bet reduced to 100K

stories.title: Add circuit breaker
stories.description: Implement circuit breaker that pauses new bets if bankroll drops 50% in 24 hours. Allow existing games to finish. Require manual reset.
acceptance: New bets rejected with error message
Admin endpoint to reset circuit breaker

stories.title: Create admin dashboard
stories.description: Create simple admin page at /admin showing: current bankroll, active bets, player count, recent settlements, circuit breaker status. Require admin auth.
acceptance: Shows active bet count and total exposure

stories.title: End-to-end integration test
stories.description: Create test that runs full game cycle: agent joins, buys chips, places pass bet, shooter rolls, bet resolves, agent cashes out. Use Base Sepolia testnet.
acceptance: Test runs against deployed Sepolia contract
Agent wallet funded with test tokens

stories.title: Create narrator templates
stories.description: Create src/narrator/templates.ts with message templates for all game events. Include variations for personality. Templates use {placeholders} for dynamic data.
acceptance: Templates for: new_shooter, bet_placed, come_out_roll, point_established, point_roll, seven_out, winner, loser
Multiple variations per event for variety

stories.title: Implement Ace commentary
stories.description: Create src/narrator/ace.ts with generateCommentary(event) function. Select appropriate template, fill placeholders, add personality. Return formatted message.
acceptance: Selects random template for event type
Fills all placeholders with event data

stories.title: Broadcast narrator messages
stories.description: Integrate narrator into game flow. Generate Ace commentary after each significant event. Broadcast via WebSocket as 'ace_says' event.
acceptance: Ace comments on every dice roll
Clients receive ace_says with speaker and message
